Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have a rash on my left lower leg that has been there for several weeks.
What does the rash look like?
The rash has multiple raised, darker colored spots and there's a large, lighter colored patch on my lower shin where there used to be a big ulcer.
Did you have any injury or infection in that area before the ulcer and rash developed?
No, I did not have any injury or infection in that area before the ulcer and rash developed.
Do you have any other underlying health conditions like diabetes or peripheral vascular disease?
No, I do not have any other medical problems.
Has anyone in your family ever had similar skin issues or chronic skin diseases?
No, no one in my family has had similar skin issues or chronic skin diseases.
Is the area around the rash itchy or painful?
The rash is painless and does not itch.
Final Diagnosis: Venous stasis dermatitis.
